ingredients.ingredient: 4 slices cold center-cut, thinly sliced bacon
2 tablespoons prepared yellow mustard, or to taste
2 tablespoons dill pickle relish, or to taste
2 teaspoons diced red onion, or to taste
2 tablespoons diced tomato, or to taste

cookingTips: Wrap bacon tightly around hot dogs and secure with toothpicks if needed
Cook bacon until crispy before serving so it doesn't slide off the hot dog
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you cook the bacon-wrapped hot dogs evenly without burning the outside?
